text: mnoussa chaotalngong muoychamnuon nung niyeay tha tae aveitow del thveu aoy puokke( mou slei m) ber chenhpi ki b la t( tisa chhpaohtow ye rau sa loem) del puokke thleab tamrong pimoun mk( nowpel del puokke thvayobangkoum)? chaur anak( mou ham meat) tb vinh tha tisakheangkaet ning tisakheanglich kuchea kammosetthi robsa a l laoh . trong changaoulobangheanh anaknea del trong mean chetnea towkean meakra da troemotrauv
